apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple with heart emoji depicts two men, one with a medium-dark skin tone and the other with a default skin tone, embracing or standing closely with a vibrant red heart between them. Apple's signature realistic lighting and 3D shading give the figures a tangible presence and the heart a lustrous glow. The soft, rounded edges of the design enhance the overall feeling of love, partnership, and shared affection, making it a powerful symbol of romantic relationships on Apple devices.
